metadata.title: Random Pokemon Generator | #1 Team Builder & Nuzlocke Tool [2025]
metadata.description: Generate random Pokemon teams in seconds! Free team builder for Nuzlocke, Soul Link & challenge runs. Filter 1025+ Pokemon by type, gen & rarity. Works with Scarlet/Violet!
metadata.pokedexTitle: Pokédex Database | All 1025 Pokemon Stats, Types & Abilities
metadata.pokedexDescription: Complete Pokemon database with all 1025 Pokemon from Gen 1-9. Search by type, view stats, abilities, evolutions & HD sprites. Updated for Scarlet & Violet!
metadata.pokemonDetailDescription: Complete {name} guide: base stats, type matchups, abilities, evolution chain & moveset. Official artwork & sprites included.

home.title: RANDOM POKEMON GENERATOR
home.subtitle: Build your dream team from all 9 generations
home.emptyTeam: Click generate to build your team!

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.content: Random Pokemon Generator helps trainers discover new team combinations and make competitive battling more accessible through randomization.

whatWeOffer.title: What We Offer
whatWeOffer.content: Advanced filtering by generation, type, rarity, and evolution stage. Whether you're planning a Nuzlocke challenge or seeking inspiration for your next playthrough, our tool provides endless possibilities.

perfectFor.title: Perfect For
perfectFor.content: Nuzlocke runs • Soul Link challenges • Random team battles • Content creators • Artists seeking Pokemon subjects • Competitive team building practice

copyrightNotice.title: Copyright Notice
copyrightNotice.content: Pokemon and all related names, characters, and distinctive likenesses are trademarks of Nintendo, The Pokemon Company, and Game Freak. This website is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to Nintendo, The Pokemon Company, or Game Freak.

fanProject.title: Fan Project Status
fanProject.content: This is a non-commercial fan project created for educational and entertainment purposes. We do not claim ownership of any Pokemon intellectual property.

dataSources.title: Data Sources
dataSources.content: Pokemon data is sourced from the PokeAPI (pokeapi.co), an open-source RESTful Pokemon API. Official artwork and sprites belong to their respective copyright holders.

fairUse.title: Fair Use
fairUse.content: This project operates under fair use principles. All Pokemon-related content is used for informational and transformative purposes. If you are a rights holder and have concerns, please contact us.

privacy.intro: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data under GDPR and international privacy regulations.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect minimal anonymous usage data through Google Analytics, including page views, session duration, and general location (country level only). No personal identifying information is collected.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for site functionality and analytics cookies for performance monitoring. You can disable cookies in your browser settings at any time.

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.content: Your generated teams and preferences are stored locally in your browser. This data never leaves your device and is not transmitted to our servers.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use Vercel for hosting and Cloudflare for CDN services. These providers may collect standard server logs (IP addresses, browser type) as outlined in their respective privacy policies.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, or delete your personal data. Since we collect minimal data, most information is already anonymized. For questions, contact us via GitHub.

updates.title: Updates
updates.content: This privacy policy was last updated on January 2025. We may update this policy periodically. Continued use of the site constitutes acceptance of any changes.

q1.question: How do I generate a random Pokemon team?
q1.answer: Simply click the 'GENERATE TEAM' button. Our tool instantly selects 6 unique Pokemon from Gen 1 to Gen 9, creating a balanced team for Nuzlockes or creative drawing challenges.

q2.question: Can I exclude Legendary Pokemon?
q2.answer: Yes. Use the 'Rarity' filter above the generator to exclude Legendaries, Mythicals, or Ultra Beasts for a standard playthrough experience.

q3.question: Is this updated for Pokemon Scarlet and Violet?
q3.answer: Yes. Our database includes the complete Paldea Pokédex and is updated regularly for new DLC expansions.

q4.question: Can I generate Pokemon cards with this tool?
q4.answer: Yes! Each generated Pokemon displays as a stylized card with stats, types, and official artwork. Perfect for collectors, TCG fans, or creating custom card collections.

q5.question: What is the Pokedex database?
q5.answer: Our comprehensive Pokedex contains detailed information on all 1025 Pokemon across every generation. Browse stats, types, abilities, evolution chains, and Pokedex entries for any Pokemon.

pokedex.title: GLOBAL DATABASE
pokedex.subtitle: Complete index of {count} registered Pokemon species. Search, browse, and access detailed specifications.

pokemon.finalEvolvedForm: This is the final evolved form.

challengeModeDescriptions.monoType: All Pokemon share at least one type
challengeModeDescriptions.noDuplicateLines: No Pokemon from the same evolution family

challengeIdeas.title: Try These Rules With Your Team
challengeIdeas.subtitle: Push your skills with these challenge modes

hardcoreNuzlocke.title: Hardcore Nuzlocke
hardcoreNuzlocke.description: No items in battle, level caps at each gym, set mode only. If a Pokemon faints, it's gone forever.

soulLink.title: Soul Link
soulLink.description: Partner with a friend! Each of your Pokemon is linked to one of theirs - if one faints, both are gone.

typeLocke.title: Type-Locke
typeLocke.description: Only use Pokemon of a single type. This team's primary type would make for a great mono-type run!

randomMoves.title: Random Movesets
randomMoves.description: Each Pokemon can only use 4 randomly selected moves from their learnset.

noEvolutions.title: No Evolutions
noEvolutions.description: Play through the entire game without evolving any Pokemon. Test your base form strategies!

itemless.title: Itemless Run
itemless.description: No held items allowed. Pure skill and strategy only.

speedrun.title: Speedrun Challenge
speedrun.description: Try to complete the game as fast as possible using only this team.

egglocke.title: Egglocke Prep
egglocke.description: Use this team as your egg pool - trade eggs with friends containing these Pokemon.

seo.typeIntro: This {types}-type Pokemon was first introduced in {generation}.
seo.evolutionLine: {name} is part of the {chain} evolution line.
seo.battleStrategy: In terms of battle strategy, {name} has a total base stat of {total}.
seo.highestStat: Its highest attribute is {stat} ({value}), making it a strong choice for trainers looking for {role}.
seo.physicalDescription: Standing at {height} meters tall and weighing {weight} kg, {name} is a {size} Pokemon
seo.conclusion: Whether you're building a competitive team or completing your Pokédex, {name} offers unique strengths worth considering.
seo.relatedPokemon: Want to learn about related Pokemon? Check out

cardShowcase.description: Turn any generated Pokémon into a high-resolution collectible card. Perfect for sharing your Nuzlocke encounters or dream team on social media.

protocol.title: ADVANCED POKEMON GENERATOR
protocol.subtitle: Your Ultimate Companion for Random Pokemon Selection
protocol.paragraph1: Whether you're building a balanced team, exploring new favorites, or adding a touch of luck to your next game, our generator makes it easy to discover your next Pokemon companion.
protocol.paragraph2: Use it for Nuzlocke challenges, Soul Link tournaments, or simply to have fun experimenting with unique team combinations.

instructions.title: How to Use Our Random Pokemon Generator
instructions.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to generate your random Pokemon team

step1.title: Step 1: Choose Team Size
step1.description: Select how many Pokemon you want to generate - from 1 to 6 for a full team. You can also opt for a single Pokemon for quick decisions.

step2.title: Step 2: Apply Filters (Optional)
step2.description: Refine your selection by filtering by Pokemon type, generation, or legendary status. This helps you get more customized teams for specific challenges.

step3.title: Step 3: Generate Your Team
step3.description: Press the generate button and watch your random Pokemon appear. Each Pokemon comes with its details, including types, abilities, and base stats.

step4.title: Step 4: Learn About Each Pokemon
step4.description: Click on any generated Pokemon to see detailed information including moves, evolution lines, and more.

step5.title: Step 5: Regenerate or Save
step5.description: Not satisfied with the results? Simply regenerate. Or save your team for future reference.

step6.title: Step 6: Share Your Team
step6.description: Share your generated team with friends via social media or direct link.

nuzlocke.title: Tools for Pokemon Nuzlocke Challenges
nuzlocke.subtitle: Power up your Nuzlocke gaming experience with our random Pokemon generator
nuzlocke.intro: Nuzlocke runs are one of the most thrilling ways to play Pokemon games. With rules that add real consequences to battle, every decision matters. Our generator helps you:

challenge1.title: Soul Link Challenge
challenge1.description: Pair randomly generated Pokemon with a partner for a cooperative challenge.

challenge2.title: Wonderlocke Challenge
challenge2.description: Simulate surprise trade encounters with completely random selections.

challenge3.title: Monotype Challenge
challenge3.description: Generate single-type teams for the most challenging monotype runs.

challenge4.title: Starter Selection
challenge4.description: Can't decide your starter? Let the generator choose your initial companion.

challenge5.title: Randomizer Run
challenge5.description: Combine with ROM randomizers for unpredictable team planning.

capabilities.title: Random Generator Features
capabilities.subtitle: Discover what makes our Pokemon generator unique

feature1.title: Complete Pokedex
feature1.description: Access to all 1000+ Pokemon including all regional forms and variants.

feature2.title: Smart Filtering
feature2.description: Advanced filters for type, generation, rarity, and more.

feature3.title: Detailed Information
feature3.description: Comprehensive info on stats, moves, abilities, and evolution lines for each Pokemon.

feature4.title: Social Sharing
feature4.description: Easily share your generated team on social media platforms or save as image.

whyChoose.title: The Best Online Random Pokemon Generator
whyChoose.subtitle: Why do trainers trust our random Pokemon generator?
whyChoose.paragraph1: We've built this generator with both casual players and hardcore speedrunners in mind. Whether you're looking for a balanced team for competitive playthroughs or just want some random fun, we have the right tools.
whyChoose.paragraph2: Our generator is regularly updated with the latest Pokemon data and offers a seamless experience across all devices.
